title: Social Arithmetic Learning Course Based on Islamic Financial Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arithmetic Skills (Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division) and Understanding of Islamic Finance Principles
context.additional_context: Students use personal devices (tablets/laptops) to analyze real-life Islamic finance scenarios and solve arithmetic problems, emphasizing financial decision-making skills in social contexts.

learning_goals: Perform basic arithmetic operations with 85% accuracy in social arithmetic problems within Islamic finance contexts (e.g., Zakat calculation, Murabaha transactions)
Identify at least three hidden arithmetic elements in given Islamic finance cases (e.g., Islamic insuranceâ€”Takaful)
Apply arithmetic knowledge to real Islamic finance scenarios (e.g., Haram-free investment plans) and propose at least two actionable solutions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
